message: Let's start fair, I'll take most of the money this time, but next round you get to make the offer. Deal?
You got 9000 last round, I'm starting to get worried you're going to take everything!
I think we can find a more balanced split than that last offer.  Let's try something closer to the middle.
You're still getting more than me, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle, but I think I deserve a bit more for my patience
